mapper.insert: insert into sales_target (sales_target_id, position_id, sales_target_year, sales_target_year_amount) values (#{sales_target_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{position_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sales_target_year,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sales_target_year_amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
mapper.select: select sales_target_id, position_id, sales_target_year, sales_target_year_amount from sales_target
